at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player may discard a card at random if the player does untap that creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player sacrifices that creature unless they pay genericmana
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller destroy that land unless that player pays genericmana or n life
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player may pay genericmana specialmana if the player does untap that creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller put a minus n minus n counter on that creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals x damage to that player where x is the number of infection counters on cardname
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller that player loses n life unless they pay genericmana
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller that player sacrifices it unless they pay specialmana where x is its mana value
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals n damage to that player

at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player may pay any amount of mana cardname deals n damage to that player prevent x of that damage where x is the amount of mana that player paid this way
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player loses n life
at the beginning of each upkeep tap enchanted creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller that player loses n life
